text: pachi jo teni khabara pade ke te banne saksi ko'i papa kari betha che, to te loko manthi jeni same papa thayo hato ane be vyakti te badha manthi sauthi najika hata, jyam te banne ubha hata, a banne ubha thaya ane allahana soganda khaya ke kharekhara amari a soganda te banneni te soganda karata satya che, ane ame saheja pana atireka nathi karyo, ame te paristhitimam sakhata atyacari bani ja'isum
